name: HOFr
description:
There are fans and there are HOFrs. Which are you?

What is HOFr? It’s 2018’s coolest sports app. Make predictions, win prizes, discover who’s the best fan.

Log in before the big games for an exclusive live show. Our host will challenge you to make predictions about the game. Then stay tuned for alerts as your predictions come good. (They will come good, right?)

Watch the leaderboard during the game to see the top fans emerge. Did you finish in the winning spots? You’re a true HOFr. A fan worthy of respect, a few drinks from your buddies—and a cash prize from us.
